Package com.rotartsi.jgame.sprite

Class MaskedSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rotartsi.jgame.sprite.Sprite
      • com.rotartsi.jgame.sprite.MaskedSprite
  • public class MaskedSprite
extends Sprite
    A sprite using a PolygonCollide for collision detection rather than a traditional Rectangle
